summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Trenton Street from 12th Avenue South to the east line of lot 39, block 47, South Park Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8978 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
